\name{Distance.Shooter}
\alias{Distance.Shooter}
\title{Distance.Shooter}
\usage{
Distance.Shooter <- (PLAYER_NAME, FG_3)
}
\arguments{
\item{PLAYER_NAME}{The name of the player}
\item{FG_3}{3 point percentage of player as decimal}
}
\description{
Rate a players ability to shoot 3 pointers
}
\examples{
Distance.Shooter("Lebron James", .42)
}
